answers.answer: Hi,I hope that Victoza will work for you for a long, long time, but in reality,as with all oral Diabetes meds, Victoza would work from 1 to 2,3 years the most.I would Google it like Victoza forum..Good luck

question: I was just put on this medicine.  I love it for the fact that my sugars were out of control. Even with insulin and an oral mediation. The Dr is trying to get it approved through insurance. I just hope I can keep taking it for the first time in a year 1/2 my sugar is under control. I do need to lose weight also but my first priority is to get it in check. Cause no matter what I eat my sugar goes up. I just hope I can keep taking it.
title: victoza
